LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeDrugs.stages.0.label: forced me to take drugs
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeDrugsMood.stages.0.label: forced to take drugs
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeDrugsMood.stages.0.descrip: I'm a teetotaler; I would never take drugs by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeLuciferium.stages.0.label: forced me to take luciferium
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeLuciferiumMood.stages.0.de: I'm a prosthophobe; I would never take luciferium by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
